text:
Hi guys welcome to Genevieve's Playhouse,
today we're going to do a toy review of Peppa
Pig's Treehouse playset.

On the back here it's got moving branches,
a fun slide, a tyre swing, a tree house den,

connects to playground playset so if you have
other playground playsets it'll connect to

that, and it connects to the road track and
down here it shows you all of the different

things you can get and you can connect them
all together to have your own Peppa Pig world.
So let's go ahead and open this up.

This treehouse comes with an exclusive peppa
figure, she has a blue dress on instead of

her usual red dress and blue shoes instead
of black and she can open her arms and close
them like Peppa's giving a hug.
Peppa has five little flowers on her necklace.

So let's go ahead and untie everything here
so that we start playing with this playset.
So let's take a closer look.

Our first thing is the little seesaw here
which is George's favorite thing to do at

the playground, he likes to go up and down
on the seesaw with this best friend Richard
Rabbit.

The tyre swing here, the tree swing, here's
a slide, and up here we have a little picnic

table that has a piece of bread and some cheese
for a good little snack.

And here we have a little hideaway, the treehouse,
the treehouse part.

You can see inside it has a table set with
tea with pictures on the wall, and it has
a window in the back.
Very, very cute.

Alright now that we have this open, how about
we play.

So let's take our Peppa Pig here and send
her down the slide.
Weeee!
She can go on the seesaw.

Peppa needs someone to sit on the seesaw with
her.
And the swing on the tree here.

She just kind of slides down in there and
this

little red piece here is plastic so Peppa
Pig can fit right down in there, so she doesn't
fall down.

And look, you turn the leaf of the swing here
and the swing raises up and that's how Peppa
Pig gets to the top of the treehouse here.

So she can have her picnic, her cheese and
her bread, and when she's done she can go
down the slide.
Alright so let's see the tyre swing.

Uh oh, Peppa's a bit too big to fit in the
tyre swing.
She doesn't fit in there very well.

Here legs are too big to fit in there, so
I wonder if this tyre swing is for George
Pig.

Now we didn't get a George in this playset,
but luckily we have George pig and Daddy Pig

and Mummy Pig we also have some of Peppa Pig's
friends who want to play on the treehouse

too, we have Danny Dog, Emily Elephant, Susie
Sheep who is Peppa Pig's best friend, Pedro
Pony, and Rebecca Rabbit.

Alright, so let's see if George Pig fits in
this tyre swing.

You kind of have to squeeze his feet together
to get him to....
Oh!

Okay so there's a little booster here, not
quite sure what that's for.

But if you take that out, George Pig fits
in there just fine.

Okay so I think Peppa Pig wants to ride on
the seesaw.

Let's set Peppa here and we'll have her best
friend Susie Sheep sit with her.
And Danny Dog wants to go on the tree swing.

Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are going to sit up
here for the picnic.
One of Daddy Pig's favorite things is to eat.
Everybody else can enjoy going down the slide.
Weee!
Weee!
Weee!

Everyone is enjoying a good day at Peppa Pigs
Treehouse.
There goes Danny Dog.

"Excuse me, Daddy Pig, I'd like to go down
the slide."
"Go right ahead, Danny Dog."
Weee!.
"My turn, my turn!"

Let's put the swing back down so Susie Sheep
can have a turn.

"Ho, ho, Mummy Pig, let's enjoy our picnic
down on the ground."
"Right oh, Daddy Pig."
Susie's turn.
"This is so much fun!"
Weee!
"My turn, my turn!
This IS my treehouse after all."
Weee!
"My turn!
My turn!"
George Pig wants to go down the slide.
"Be careful, George, you're too small."
"No I'm not!"
Weee!
Alright!

Everybody has had a great day at Peppa Pig's
treehouse.

I really like this toy and I think Genevieve
will too.

She loves having toy figures go down slides,
and she'll like this little treehouse up here

and the fact that the swing goes up and down
to get them, you know, up here to go down
the slide is pretty cool.

So all in all I think this is a pretty great
toy.

Well I hope you guys enjoyed this toy review
and let me know in the comments what you'd
like to see next time.
Thanks guys!
